description: This Dart script is a utility tool intended to be run from the root of a Flutter project. It performs environment checks and executes Flutter commands `pub get` and `analyze` to ensure project dependencies are installed and code is analyzed. It verifies the presence of a `pubspec.yaml` file, checks for the Flutter SDK in the system PATH, and then runs the commands, handling errors appropriately.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The entry point of the script. Checks for `pubspec.yaml`, verifies Flutter SDK availability, runs `flutter pub get` and `flutter analyze`, and exits with the respective status codes.

methods.name: run
methods.description: A helper function that executes a command with arguments, inherits standard IO, and returns the exit code.
